fields.name: Rogue
fields.description:
The rogue wants the mafia to win. Unfortunately, they don’t know who the mafia are. The rogue may attempt to kill any player by tapping them on the shoulder and saying “BANG”. If the kill succeeds, or if the rogue was disarmed, then they can’t make another kill until three days later. The rogue may not try to kill the same person twice on the same day.

Additionally, the rogue can destroy evidence as if they were a member of the mafia

fields.name: Vigilante
fields.description:
Once per game, a vigilante may attempt to kill any player by tapping them on the shoulder and saying “BANG”. If the person died and was mafia (including conscript) or rogue, then the vigilante gains this ability back, but cannot use it again until the following day.
NOTE FROM GOD: Do not troll. Look at the ‘goal’ section carefully.

fields.name: Vampire
fields.description:
At the start of game, each vampire will be told three roles (chosen at random from the 8 town roles) that they find tasty. In addition, all vampires find mafia (including conscripts) and rogues tasty. 
Before the start of each day, the Vampire can designate any number of people they wish to drink a pint of blood from that night.  A vampire may never designate the same player a second time. Each person only has two pints of blood. If a person doesn’t have enough blood left for all of the vampires drinking their blood, the vampires drink in a random order until the person runs out of blood.

Drinking a player’s blood does not affect them at all, and a player does not know if a vampire drinks his blood. At the start of each day, each vampire finds out who he drank blood from successfully, and whether or not it was tasty. If a vampire ever drinks blood that wasn’t tasty to them, they die. Additionally, if they die this way, the mafia gains a use of kaboom.

If a vampire drank blood from zero people on the previous night, then if the mafia kill them on the following day, the mafia get a use of kaboom. If a vampire drank blood from one person on the previous night, they get no bonus or penalty. If a vampire drank blood from two people or more people on the previous night, then if anyone tries to use “BANG” on them, they may respond with “I do not die” (You have 10 seconds to say this).

fields.name: Superhero
fields.description:
The superhero has two forms: Superhero Identity and Secret Identity. Before the start of each day, the superhero can tell god which identity he wants to be on the following day. God use a default of Secret Identity unless told otherwise.

Secret Identity:
While in secret identity, the superhero may visit murder sites and study clues, as if they were an investigator. The superhero may NOT make investigations. Additionally, if the superhero’s paranoia has activated, they may respond to all “BANG” attempts on the following day with “I do not die” (You have 10 seconds to say this). The superhero can only get his paranoia to activate while in his superhero identiy.

Superhero Identity:
While in superhero identity, the superhero may make investigations as if they were an investigator. The superhero may NOT study clues at murder sites. Additionally, before each day, the superhero may make a one-person “paranoia list” (God will assume it stays the same unless told otherwise). If that player dies, then the superhero’s paranoia activates for the following day. The superhero does not gain an advantage from this unless he chooses his secret identity on the following day.

fields.name: Innocent Child
fields.description: The innocent child is allowed to use the phrase “I am an Innocent child and I trust you”, both in person and through electronic communication. No one else is allowed to use this phrase. The mafia have an ability that allows them to kill innocent children easier.

fields.name: Gay Knight
fields.description: At the start of game, each Gay Knight will know the identity of their partner, who is also a Gay Knight. If a Gay Knight dies, then their partner will die at the end of the following day (If the mafia a Gay Knight at 6 PM Tuesday, their partner will die at 11 PM Wednesday). Twice per game, if a Gay Knight’s partner is dead, they may guess their partner’s killer (Note: They don’t gather clues and are immune to mafia powers that trick investigators). If they guess correctly, then they are allowed to attempt one kill on their partner’s killer by tapping them on the shoulder and saying “BANG.” Additionally, if a Gay Knight guesses correctly, they may respond to anyone who tries to use “BANG” on them by saying “I do not die” (You have 10 seconds to say this).

fields.name: Investigator
fields.description:
Whenever a kill is made, a number of clues spawn equal to the number of mafia (including conscripts), plus the number of rogues, plus one. An investigator may visit a kill location to study all clues at that kill location. God will inform him how many clues he finds. After studying a kill location, an investigator must wait an hour before studying the same kill location. Studying the same location multiple times does not grant more investigations.

Once per day, an investigator may ask god a question of the form “Did X kill Y?” A single investigator can only make as many total investigations of a player’s death as he found clues at that player’s murder location.

fields.name: Desperado
fields.description: Once per game, before the start of a day, the Desperado can tell god that they are going Desperado (you can make the request conditional on day-end events, or cancel the request as long as it’s not too late). While going Desperado, they gain all of the abilities of an investigator. Additionally, if anyone tries to use “BANG” on a desperado who has “gone desperado”, they may respond by saying “I do not die” (You have 10 seconds to say this). After two days of going Desperado, the desperado dies (after the lynch, but before day start).

fields.name: Conspiracy Theorist
fields.description: Before the start of each day, the Conspiracy Theorist may designate up to 10% of game (rounding up) for their conspiracy list. (God will assume it says the same unless told otherwise) If anyone on their conspiracy list attempts to use “BANG” on them, they may respond with “I do not die” (You have 10 seconds to say this).
